short_summary: Salmon Patrol Services Stream Enumeration Surveys
description: Fisheries and Oceans Canada has a requirement to conduct Salmon Patrol Services stream enumeration surveys by swimming or on-foot in Pacific Fishery Management Areas 12, 13 and 14 (Johnstone Strait & Mainland Inlets). The intent is to establish a standing offer for each patrol area so that the contractor can be called up to provide services on an as and when required basis.
full_summary:
===============

### Tender Notice

Fédération des industries de services de consulting & services commerciaux en français
=====================================================

**Tender Title**
---------------

Patrol Services for Lower Johnstone Strait & Mainland Inlets

**Tender Reference**
------------------

* **Reference Number:** PW-22-01015473
* **Solicitation Number:** 30002824

### Tender Details

* **Category:** Service
* **Notice Type:** Request for Standing Offer
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Estimated Contract Value:** To be determined
* **Contract Term:** February 1, 2023 to January 31, 2028

### Background

Fisheries and Oceans Canada (DFO) seeks to establish a standing offer for Salmon Patrol Services to conduct stream enumeration surveys by swimming or on-foot in Pacific Fishery Management Areas 12, 13, and 14 (Johnstone Strait & Mainland Inlets).

### Requirements

* Conduct stream enumeration surveys in Pacific Fishery Management Areas 12, 13, and 14
* Provide standing offer for each patrol area
* Establish a contract term of February 1, 2023 to January 31, 2028

### Contact Information

* **Contact Name:** Kimberly Walker
* **Email:** DFOtenders-soumissionsMPO@dfo-mpo.gc.ca

### Procurement Documents

* **English:** [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/01/77a5d22c61898642304784ae32eeb2aa/30002824_-_rfso_lower_johnstone_strait_mainland_inlets_en.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/01/77a5d22c61898642304784ae32eeb2aa/30002824_-_rfso_lower_johnstone_strait_mainland_inlets_en.pdf)
* **French:** [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/01/55f650676ec0749392d91bc0a7879c5e/30002824_-_rfso_lower_johnstone_strait_mainland_inlets_fr.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/01/55f650676ec0749392d91
